DOC.brief_summary: Participants assign A B group scale 1:1 base prospectively randomize treatment-sequence assignment , i.e . infuse SCT800 follow Xyntha ( group A ) , alternate sequence ( group B ) . All participant complete SCT800HA1 study enter efficacy safety study ( Protocol No . : SCT800HA3 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study SCT800 Previously Treated Patients With Hemophilia A
DOC.criteria: 12 65 year old ; The activity coagulation factor VIII ( FVIII : C ) ≤2 % , previously treat FVIII concentrate ( ) minimum 50 exposure day ( EDs ) prior study entry Nonbleeding state ( No clinical manifestation active hemorrhage ) ; Negative assay FVIII inhibitor ( ＜0.6 BU/mL ) ; The platelet count normal； Normal prothrombin time INR ≤1.5； Given inform consent Hypersensitivity recombinant coagulation factor VIII concentrate excipients ; allergic heterologous protein ( e.g . murine , bovine hamster origin ) ; Family history history FVIII inhibitor ( ≥0.6 Bethesda Units [ BU ] mL1 ) ; Received infusion FVIII ondemand therapy prophylaxis within 4 day prior study entry ( include rFVIII , plasmaderived factor VIII [ pdFVIII ] , cryoprecipitate whole blood ) ; Significant hepatic renal impairment ( ALT AST ≥2×ULN ; BUN Cr≥2×ULN ) ; HIV seropositive ; Abnormal hemostasis cause hemophilia A； Patients severe heart disease , include myocardial infarction , heart failure ( III high level ) ; Patients receive anticoagulant antiplatelet therapy within one week ( include NSAIDs ) need receive anticoagulant antiplatelet therapy period clinical trial ; Alcoholism , drug abuse , mental disorder mental retardation ; Elective surgery plan process study ; Patients previously participate clinical trial prior study entry ; The patient parent/legal guardian unable unwilling sign inform consent form comply requirement clinical protocol ; Other condition confirm researcher , result patient unable benefit clinical observation ;
